section.name: Download the plugin
section.p: You can download latest version at anycode on sourceforge.

section.name: How to install ?
section.p: Run Astah* Community/Pro and install the plugin from Astah menu. Check that the plugin is enabled
Once installed, anycode menu appears when opening a class diagram.
In anycode configuration panel, you are invited to set 2 paths :

ul.li: Target directory : base path where files are supposed to be generated
Template directory : path where all your custom templates are. To start with creating templates, please read User Guide
